nodes.long_description:
🦈🏝 CAN YOU SURVIVE THE NEW SHARK ISLAND?! 🦈🏝

Make everyday a holiday with friends in your very own tropical island playground. Paddle, get fit, discover new islands and hidden treasure, or just relax and hang out with friends (online multiplayer).

On 'SUP Island' (SUP = Stand Up Paddleboard) you stand on a big surfboard and use a long paddle to move yourself over the water.  It's the perfect sport for virtual reality as you and your board move naturally through the world, just like in real-life.

Relaxation or fitness? You choose. Paddle around and explore your surroundings, and before you know it you'll have achieved your fitness goals and be finding treasure and earning rewards like new boards, paddles and locations. Fitness tracking is built-in so you can see your real-time stats like time paddled, distance, and estimated calories burnt.

Everything's better with friends so start a party in your headset and invite your VR friends to hang out on your own private island.

What are you waiting for? Visit SUP Island today!
nodes.short_description:
🦈🏝 CAN YOU SURVIVE THE NEW SHARK ISLAND?! 🦈🏝

Make everyday a holiday with friends in your very own tropical island playground. Paddle, get fit, discover new islands and hidden treasure, or just relax and hang out with friends (online multiplayer).

Stand Up Paddleboarding (SUP) is the perfect sport for virtual reality as you and your board move naturally through the world, just like in real-life.

nodes.long_description:
PRE-RELEASE BETA

Your very own island adventure awaits. Paddle, get fit, discover new islands and hidden treasure, or just relax and hang out with friends (online multiplayer) in your exclusive private resort.

On 'SUP Island' (SUP = Stand Up Paddleboard) you stand on a large surfboard and use a paddle to move yourself over the water.  It's the perfect sport for virtual reality as you and your board move naturally through the world, just like in real-life.

Relaxation or fitness? You choose. Paddle around and explore your surroundings, and before you know it you'll have achieved your fitness goals and be finding treasure and earning rewards like new boards, paddles and locations. Fitness tracking is built-in so you can see your real-time stats like time paddled, distance, and estimated calories burnt.

Host your friends on your own private island: it's invite only, so your experience is fun, safe and filled only with people you know.

What are you waiting for? Visit SUP Island today!

PRE-RELEASE BETA

Your very own island adventure awaits. Paddle, get fit, discover new islands and hidden treasure, or just relax and hang out with friends (online multiplayer) in your exclusive private resort.

Stand Up Paddleboarding (SUP) is the perfect sport for virtual reality as you and your board move naturally through the world, just like in real-life.

Relaxation or fitness? You choose. Before you know it you'll have achieved your fitness goals and be earning rewards.

nodes.change_log:
Release Notes - v0.9 - SHARK ISLAND

Thanks for trying out the EARLY ADOPTER version of our game. There is a lot more to come, but your early feedback is already helping us create the game you want to play. As we add more features the base price of the game will be going up - but as an early adopter you'll get all the upgrades for free, plus codes for special limited edition items.

In this release we've added a new location: "Shark Island". See if you and your friends can make it through the shark infested waters and find the huge gold coin stash.

- New! Sharks
- New! Shark Island: Can you make it through the shark infested waters?
- New! Interactive billboards: jump straight to the action
- New! Exclusive board to unlock
- New! More stats: shark tracking and attacks

Fixes:
- Marine animal intelligence and pathfinding improved
- Improved menu buttons and sounds

Coming Soon:
- More islands to unlock
- Game modes
- Island objectives to unlock new boards and paddles
- Youtube video/music player
- More wildlife

Let us know what else you'd like to see!  https://ezone.com/discord

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.8 - MYSTERY ISLAND

Thanks for trying out the EARLY ADOPTER version of our game. There is a lot more to come, but your early feedback is already helping us create the game you want to play. As we add more features the base price of the game will be going up - but as an early adopter you'll get all the upgrades for free, plus codes for special limited edition items.

In this release we've added a whole new location "Mystery Island". Travel here with your friends and explore together. Follow the clues to find the secret entrance of the lost prehistoric nesting grounds.

Also, for players with limited mobility (or if you are just feeling tired) we've added thumbstick controls: push the controller thumbstick in the direction you want to go.

- New! Mystery Island
- New! Caves and rocks
- New! Waterfalls
- New! Dust particles in caves
- New! Godray sun effects
- New! Interactive objects (use your paddle to crack open)
- New! Terror Bird Board
- New! Thumbstick controls

Fixes:
- Simplified tutorial
- Status updates moved to in-front and underwater
- Improved/smoother physics

Coming Soon:
- More islands to unlock
- Game modes
- Island objectives to unlock new boards and paddles
- Youtube video/music player
- More wildlife

Let us know what else you'd like to see!  https://ezone.com/discord

- Simon and Jamie

Thanks for trying out the EARLY ADOPTER version of our game. There is a lot more to come, but your early feedback is already helping us create the game you want to play.  As we add more features the base price of the game will be going up - but as an early adopter you'll get all the upgrades for free, plus codes for special limited edition items.

In this release we've added some triggers to the Home Island. Some are proximity triggers (like the SUP Island gate and different music areas) and others are interactive triggers (like the bell) that require a hit with the paddle. These triggers will be rolling out to more islands in future updates and will open up a whole range of gameplay possibilities.

There are also new fish, seagulls, a little reef area and a juicy new SUP Island gold doubloon. We've also improved the lighting so objects more accurately match the environment. 

New:
- Interactive triggers
- Seagulls
- New fish
- Reef
- SUP Island gold doubloon
- Lighting adjustments
- Fade to black between scenes

Fixes:
- Oculus Party Group Launch members now auto-join the same Destination/multiplayer room

Coming Soon:
- More islands to unlock
- Game modes
- Island objectives to unlock new boards and paddles
- Youtube video/music player
- Paddle coach to help improve your stroke
- More wildlife
- Soundtrack shop 

Let us know what else you'd like to see!  https://ezone.com/discord

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.6 - VIDEO HELPER

Thanks for trying out the EARLY ADOPTER version of our game. There is a lot more to come, but your early feedback is already helping us create the game you want to play.  As we add more features the base price of the game will be going up - but as an early adopter you'll get all the upgrades for free, plus codes for special limited edition items.

In this release we've given all the menus a major facelift and restructure. There is also a video tutorial to help new players get up to speed and introduce old players to some new tricks.

New:
- Video helper/tutorial
- Menu redesign
- Improved paddle splashes

Coming Soon:
- More islands to unlock
- Game modes
- Island objectives to unlock new boards and paddles
- Youtube video/music player
- Paddle coach to help improve your stroke
- More wildlife
- Soundtrack shop 

Let us know what else you'd like to see!  https://ezone.com/discord

- Simon and Jamie
